name: Form Submission Test
description: Test various form controls and validation on a demo form - demonstrates form interaction capabilities
requirements:
Test comprehensive form submission with various input types:
1. Navigate to the Formy demo form page
2. Fill in text fields (First Name: John, Last Name: Doe)
3. Enter job title: QA Engineer
4. Select education level: College
5. Select gender via radio button: Male
6. Select years of experience: 5-9
7. Enter date: 01/15/2024
8. Check the checkbox to agree to terms
9. Submit the form
10. Verify success message appears
expected_outcomes: Form page loads with all input fields visible
Dropdown menus show options when clicked
Radio buttons are selectable (only one at a time)
Checkbox can be checked and unchecked
Date picker allows date selection or manual entry
Form validates required fields if left empty
notes: Formy is a public demo site for testing form automation. Form may have various input types including text, radio, checkbox, select, and date fields.
